thread.section_title: Crazy Factory Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Crazy Factory | www.crazy-factory.com
thread.title: Priscilla M.
thread.title_full: Crazy Factory bewertet von Priscilla M.

author: Priscilla M.
title: Priscilla M.
text:
This site lacks customer service.
I placed an order days ago and seeing that it has not shipped, I contacted customer service to check on the status and cancel if it hadnt shipped as I did not know it was in a different country, but have yet to hear back from them.
Looks like I'll have to dispute the charge with my credit card company.
